name: GHOST DOG
description:
WASD - Movement

TAB- Switch the selection of characters

E- Confirm selection

You are a ghost in the haunted ruins and humans trespass into it. You, as a ghost, punish the humans in question by dragging them into the dungeon room by room BUT you can only control 1 human at a time as there as more than that
If you leave them unattended for 2 seconds they will gain their consciousness and you will lose control over them.
thus, the characters will freak out and start running all over the place and they can collide with dangerous obstacles which can lead to your loss.

YOU MUST KEEP THEM AT BAY AND HAVE THEM FOR LUNCHEON 

good luck!
